job.title: Data Engineer I (PD)
job.description: Purpose of JobbrbrData Engineers deliver quality reporting and data intelligence solutions to the organization and assist client teams with drawing insights to make informed data driven decisions Data Engineers DEs are engaged in all phases of the data management lifecycle gather and analyze requirements collect process store and secure use share and communicate archive reuse and repurpose data Identify and manage existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and ensure these risks are effectively identified and escalated to be measured monitored and controlledbrbrJob RequirementsbrbrWe are seeking a talented Data Engineer I for multiple positions in our bank lines of business in our Plano TX San Antonio TX  Phoenix AZ offices and or 100 work from home remote environmentbrbrData Engineers deliver quality reporting and data intelligence solutions to the organization and assist client teams with drawing insights to make informed data driven decisions Data Engineers DEs are engaged in all phases of the data management lifecycle gather and analyze requirements collect process store and secure use share and communicate archive reuse and repurpose data Identify and manage existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and ensure these risks are effectively identified and escalated to be measured monitored and controlledbrbrstronguAbout USAAbrbrustrongstrongemuJob Description brbruemstrongUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelbrbrUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsbrbrstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliIdentifies and manages existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and the job roleliliEnsures risks associated with business activities are effectively identified measured monitored and controlled liliFollows written risk and compliance policies and procedures for business activitiesliliCollaborate with senior engineers and implement technical solutionsliliDesign write test and deploy data pipeline codeliliParticipate in design and code review sessionsliliBreakdown business features and into technical stories and approachesliliHelp onboard entry level engineersbrliulWhen you apply for this position you will be required to answer some initial questions This will take approximately 5 minutes Once you begin the questions you will not be able to finish them at a later time and you will not be able to change your responsesbrbrstronguMinimum RequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of related experience beyond the minimum requiredlili4 years of data management experience implementing data solutions demonstrating depth of technical understanding within a specific disciplinestechnologysbrliulstronguPreferred Experiencebrustrongulli4 years experience developing deploying and supporting highquality faulttolerant data pipelines leveraging distributed data movement technologies and approaches including but not limited to ETL and streaming ingestion and processinglili2 or more years experience utilizing Linux scripting Python Shell etclili3 or more years experience in SQL development andor NoSQL databaseslili1 or more years experience with cloudbased data offerings Amazon AWS Redshift Snowflake Google GCP Microsoft AzureliliExperience with ETL Tools Informatica DataStage Data Build Tool etclili1 or more years of experience working with Agile Development MethodologiesbrliulThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobbrbrstronguCompensationbrbrustrongUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 88200 158900  this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationbrbrEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsbrulliGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averagebrliulstrongShift premiumstrong will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursbrbrstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs
